citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1 pm on
30-NOV-18.
Also attempted on Nov 29. On Nov 30 talked to family member who let inspector know licensee just left and won't
be home for a few hours.

narrative:
